title: Multiscale mechanical characterization of biobased photopolymers towards sustainable vat polymerization 3D printing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10422-10430
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00574K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Derek Lublin, Taige Hao, Raj Malyala, David Kisailus
In vat polymerization (VP) 3D printing, there is an urgent need to expand characterization efforts for resins derived from natural resources to counter the increasing consumption of fossil fuels required to synthesize conventional monomers.
